details.title: Intelligent machining NC program and its automatic generation in integrated environment
details.abstract: A processing environment based intelligent machining method, which utilizes an intelligent machining NC (IMNC) program, is described for use on machining centers. A new type of IMNC for box-shaped parts has been developed which can achieve various intelligent processing functions such as automatic adjustment of the part's rough localization; blank remainder based automatic determination of cutting times in rough machining; quality control supervision, measurement and machining compensation in fine processing, and breakdown anticipation in drilling, reaming and tapping. The IMNC is integrated with the CAD/CAPP/CAM environment and can be automatically generated on the CAM console. The flexibility of the manufacturing system's facilities layer has been greatly improved.
